title: Opinion: The Pixel 4a may be the last ‘delightful’ Google phone, as Pixel 6a takes a new route
content:
This week Google officially pulled the plug on the Pixel 4a, the company’s most affordable Pixel to date, and the one that so many love. Looking to the future, though, the Pixel 4a may very well be the last truly “delightful” Google phone for a while, as the company’s next step appears to be on a different path.

more…

The post Opinion: The Pixel 4a may be the last ‘delightful’ Google phone, as Pixel 6a takes a new route appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has always taken a bit of a unique approach to smartphones, but as times change, the Pixel 4a may be the last truly delightful one.
